mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( id, password, name, gender, birth, mail, phone, address, grade, reg ) VALUES( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{mail}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{grade}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select id, password, name, gender,birth, mail, phone, address, grade from Member where grade = '일반'
